name: Project4
description:
In the world of Canaan, only one hero determines who shall rule when the dark forces conquer the kingdoms. What can one person do? Join your hero's and discover the truth behind the mysteries of Canaan. You may yet find who to trust.

Solo RPG, turn based action with fast gameplay! Lovable characters to build and battle. Enjoy your journey, battle ferocious monsters, make new friends, defeat enemies and allies alike! Become the hero of Canaan!

CONTROLS ON TOUCH SCREEN:   1 FINGER = ACCEPT/CONFIRM  .......... 2 FINGERS = MENU/CANCEL

**BEST PLAYED WITH A CONTROLLER!! TOUCH CONTROLS ARE SKETCHY**

***BROWSER PLAYS ARE SLUGGISH. USE ITCH.IO APP FOR GREAT PLAY ON PC**

Thank you for playing a draft version of my first game.  

You can donate however you can or cashapp: $zerato
